text.div:
Partial Thromboplastin Time

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    14979-9 aPTT in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay
    30323-0 aPTT.factor substitution in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --1H post incubation with normal plasma
    3173-2 aPTT in Blood by Coagulation assay
    33890-5 aPTT.factor substitution in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --2H post incubation with normal plasma
    33891-3 aPTT.factor substitution in control Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --2H post incubation with normal plasma
    34189-1 aPTT.factor substitution in Platelet poor plasma --30M post incubation with normal plasma
    38276-2 aPTT in Pooled Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --1 hour post incubation
    40100-0 aPTT in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --baseline
    43734-3 aPTT in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation 1:1 saline
    52123-7 aPTT in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --post heparin adsorption
    5946-9 aPTT.factor substitution in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --immediately after addition of normal plasma
    5950-1 aPTT.factor substitution in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --20M post incubation with normal plasma
